front.title: Common Alerting Protocol (CAP) based Data-Only Emergency Alerts using the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: The Common Alerting Protocol (CAP) is an XML document format forexchanging emergency alerts and public warnings. CAP is mainly usedfor conveying alerts and warnings between authorities and fromauthorities to citizen/individuals. This document describes howdata-only emergency alerts allow to utilize the same CAP documentformat.
